Joining the Data
```{r}

df <- cust_churn_df %>%
  inner_join(customers_df, by = "custId") %>%
  select(-custId) %>%
  inner_join(subscriptions_df, by = "customerSubscrCode") %>%
  select(-customerSubscrCode) %>%
  inner_join(techsupportevals_df, by = "ID") %>%
  left_join(reviews_df, by = "reviewId") %>%
  select(-reviewId)

head(df)

```
